description.value:
Upon reaching 14th level, your connection to nature hinder their aggression toward you. When a creature within plants or difficult terrain you created with a druid spell, targets you with an attack or a harmful spell it must first make a Wisdom saving throw against your druid spell save DC. On a failed save, the attack automatically misses or they cannot target you with the spell.

Additionally, if the creature is a beast or plant and fails the saving throw, it is charmed by you until a remove curse spell is cast on it, or one hour has passed. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

The creature is aware of this effect before it makes its attack against you.

activation.condition: a creature within plants or difficult terrain you created with a druid spell, targets you with an attack or a harmful spell
